name: webcams.travel
description: The World's Largest Landscape Webcam API ***** Get webcams by categories, country, region or just nearby your location ***** Get timelapse slideshows for every webcam ***** Get an uncluttered webcam layer for your map

api_methods.name: /webcams/list/webcam={webcamid}[,{webcamid}[,...]]
api_methods.description: This is a modifier. Returns a list of webcams according to the listed {webcamid}s. Multiple {webcamid}s must be separated by comma. Required: at least one {webcamid}.

parameters.name: webcamid
parameters.description: Comma separated list of webcamids that are in the initial list. If this modifier ist not applied, all available webcams will be in the initial list.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Localize the results to this language, if available. Default: "en".

parameters.name: show
parameters.description: Content to be listed in the response. Possible values are: "webcams", "categories", "continents", "countries", "regions", "properties". Default is "webcams".

utterances.utterance: Can you show me the latest images from the webcams at Times Square and Niagara Falls?
I'd like to see a list of all available webcam categories.
Give me the current view from the webcam overlooking the Eiffel Tower, and make sure the information is in French.
What are the regions in Italy where webcams are available?
Pull up the webcam feed for the Sydney Opera House and the Great Barrier Reef.
List all the countries that have webcams in your database.
Could you provide the properties of the webcam located at Shibuya Crossing?
Show me the webcam images and their locations for the Golden Gate Bridge and Mount Rushmore.
I want to see which continents have webcams available.
Display the latest image from the webcam at Machu Picchu, and please use Spanish for the details.
